body: Think it might've been the real flower trial. It was her armor that turned into tentacles and she was wearing it before she entered the cave, it couldn't have been easily replaced. That ending might imply the true nature of the flower knight -> beautiful exterior but "tentacle" interior. The statue of the EARTH goddess having worm-looking things also work with this theory. Might also explain how no one succeeded the trial in 50 years, the others might've took off the armor which is a fail. Well it's just a theory tho
Did the statues head falling off mean it wasnt supposed to be the real flower trial
Gotta be honest here, for a second the cover made me think my guro tag blacklist stopped working.
